name: Social Capital Markets
tag_list: social-enterprise, socent, social-entrepreneurship, impact-investing, impinv, socap12
overview:
SOCAP is a world-renowned conference series dedicated to increasing the flow of capital towards social good. SOCAP connects leaders to build the market at the intersection of money and meaning. The conferences have attracted 1,000s of participants with a common interest in how to create investment-ready opportunities that tackle some of the world’s toughest social and environmental challenges.

Highlights:

  • Currently takes place in the fall in San Francisco and the spring in Europe, with plans to launch new locations and additional events in the coming years

  • Entering its 5th year, the premier fall conference, SOCAP12 in San Francisco, will convene upward of 1500 participants from more than 70 countries

  • Addresses the most cutting edge and relevant topics including: social enterprise, impact investing, strategic philanthropy, people-powered capital, technology for good, design for social innovation, the biosphere economy, and more

  • Increases awareness of social enterprise and impact investing to hundreds of thousands of people worldwide through media and content generation, live-streaming of conference sessions, and a substantial network of media and distribution partners

  • Provides an excellent platform for partners and sponsors to align their values and mission at the epicenter of the social enterprise movement. There are many options for sponsorship and annual or multi-year engagements
